DataElement.preferredName: Nodule Axial Longest Diameter Millimeter Measurement
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The measurement, in millimeters, of the longest possible length of a straight line passing through a nodule.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A small lump, swelling or collection of tissue.:Situated on or along or in the direction of an axis._The longest possible length of a straight line passing through the center of a circular or spheroid object that connects two points on the circumference.

Concepts.definition: A small lump, swelling or collection of tissue.

Property.preferredDefinition: Situated on or along or in the direction of an axis._The longest possible length of a straight line passing through the center of a circular or spheroid object that connects two points on the circumference.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A metric unit of length equal to one thousandth of a meter (10E-3 meter) or approximately 0.03937 inch._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
